attributes.action: Build wind farms in industrial areas not on the coast or in the countryside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wind farms are unsightly and spoil our coasts and countrysides.  
Building wind farms at sea or in the countryside is much more expensive than building them where they are actually needed and that is in industrial areas. Distribution losses and costs are also much higher when the wind farms are built in remote places.
Wind farms are ugly and out of keeping at sea or in the countryside.
Situated in industrial areas they strangely improve the scenery and look very in keeping with the surroundings.
